attributes.action: King Charles to dissolve parliament and force a general election.
attributes.additional_details: End the chaos of the current government
attributes.background: Enough is enough. If the current government won't call a general election then King Charles needs to step in and end the madness that is the current government.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for an immediate general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
